title: Scalable synthesis of high-quality, reduced graphene oxide with a large C/O ratio and its dispersion in a chemically modified polyimide matrix for electromagnetic interference shielding applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7641-7654
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00329B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zahid Mehmood, Syed Aizaz Ali Shah, Saeed Omer, Ramsha Idrees, Shaukat Saeed
High-quality, conductive filler-grade RGO is synthesized and uniformly dispersed in a polyimide matrix to form a high-performance EMI shielding composite material for advanced applications.
